comments.author: SmartBobby.6283
comments.body:
Lawton Campbell.8517:

Whichever’s easier for y’all, it’s no biggie having reports on both. I just like having everything in Github so I can have a kanban-style interface for tracking the million things that need to be done.

Yeah that’s absolutely understandable! For myself I think, I will feed you with bugs in GitHub and with ideas and discussions here in forums.

Greetings

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Huh, that’s not good. Looking into it now; here’s a tracking issue.

comments.author: SmartBobby.6283
comments.body:
Hey Lawton,

the /commerce/exchange endpoint does not provide the awaited return values.

Example:
https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/commerce/exchange/coins?quantity=100000

Result:
{"text":"ErrBadParam"}

It doesn’t matter, whether I am using gems or coins and the value of the quantity parameter doesn’t play a role too.

Greetings
